text:
Someone blamed Hon PM for this pandemic & said “SM is full of Modi Resign messages.”

While leaving the store, he said “Abhi hi #COVID19 se recover hua hoon. #vaccine to zarur le loonga”.

Maine kaha “Bhai, #pmleadscovidfight, isi liye treatment aur vaccinations dono mil jaayegi. https://t.co/WcVhzk50M7
